Modul CineTrack
Package org.com

Klasse CineTrackApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.com.CineTrackApplication
public class CineTrackApplication extends javafx.application.Application
Main application class for CineTrack, extending JavaFX Application. Initializes and launches the application's primary stage with login view.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Umut
